QuestData.Title: Hunger's End
QuestData.Description: I am weak. The hunger is devastating, my friend. I understand now why your dragon rests in these pools.$b$b<cough, cough>$b$bI came to warn you but... it looks like I was too late.$b$bI hear him outside now. Ael'Yith... is... here...
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! Ha ha ha haaaa!$b$bI haven't felt this alive in YEARS!$b$bWhat you've done, $n - not only to replenish my mana pools, but also to save my brood - will not be forgotten. The blues of Azsuna are ever in your debt.
